title: Simulation-Based Mastery Learning: Enhancing Social Problem-Solving Skills Through Distributed Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive courses using mobile devices in limited-technology environments. Emphasizes learner work/life schedules and clinical applicability

learning_goals: Learners analyze core causes of complex social issues with 80% accuracy through simulations.
Apply the distributed practice strategy to complete five or more simulation tasks within a week
Improve simulation performance skills by 20% or more based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
